reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks okay from a distance, and they appreciate its lovely color, flattering appearance, comfort, and high quality. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's perfect length, others find it very tight on the chest. The material quality is also mixed, with some finding it nice while others describe it as thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't explain ho CUTE! Perfect! Read for more details...
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is so cute, elegant, and flattering! My sister got it, and I’m already eyeing hers to borrow. The green is gorgeous, the ruching is adorable, and the flow of the dress is perfect. She’s 5’4”, 130 lbs, and her usual small fit beautifully. The material is just the right thickness, not too heavy or thin, and it moves so nicely. Super versatile—you can dress it up for a wedding or down for church or brunch. Honestly, this dress is a staple waiting to happen. You need this in your closet! Read more
items.author: NayVee Reese

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty dress
items.body: Lovely color and great length. I did wear a slip underneath because I felt it was a little bit sheer. Material was nice and it was comfortable. Perfect for a fall event. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for events and holidays.
items.body: Beautiful. Flattering. Perfect length for me. I’m 5’3”. I’m a size 6 and a medium was great. The neckline isn’t too low and the square neck isn’t too far out to my shoulders. The color is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Debra and Nate (Parents of 9)

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed - Not Worth the Price
items.body: The dress looks okay from a distance, but the quality is very cheap. The material feels exactly the same as a dress from SHEIN. It is a thin material that could be see through if the light was behind you, and it won’t stop sticking to my legs. You would probably need to buy a slip just to wear this dress somewhere. Also, as a larger chested woman, when I sit up straight with my shoulders back the dress is very tight on my chest, just a warning for other large chested girls. I was very disappointed in the quality and am planning to return the dress today. Read more
items.author: JennaReviewsThings

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Plastic dress - do not buy!
items.body: This was the absolute worst item I have ever received from Amazon. The material is thin and plastic-like, it feels like a plastic bag you get from a grocery store. DO NOT BUY THIS Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!!
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous, high quality, well made dress! It looks exactly as pictured and fit me perfectly! The material is soft (I’m highly sensitive to anything scratchy) and I comfortably wore it to a wedding all night. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color but thin fabric shows all
items.body: I loved the color of this dress and think it may be cute on a different body type. The chest was a little tight along the middle. The sleeves fell down often enough to be irritating. The biggest flaw was that the dress was see through. Read more
items.author: Tmtz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Really love this dress, the color is gorgeous. It was comfortable to wear and didn’t feel uncomfortable. It had a good stretch to it. I recommend the dress Read more
items.author: bryant arias

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Maroon, Rust Brown, Black, Dusty Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
